resources.string: This mode optimizes Human Centric Lighting in the office to promote productivity and healthy environment with maximum energy saving
This mode sets cooler color temperature and adjusts spectrum in the room to boost work productivity. (Recommended during cloudy weather)
This mode sets a warmer tone to your room to optimize cooling down and relaxation while saving energy.
Adjust Brightness and color temperature to your comfort. Reactivate WorkActiv mode to set values by default.
This mode allows full control of the system through the APP. Values are all set automatically thanks to the gathered data.
WorkActiv™ is a trademark of Sycra Technologies Ltd. \n Copyright© 2017~2022. All rights Reserved. \n www.sycratech.com
